Author: dontthinkineedyou
Text: if you weigh yourself, please remember that a lot of it is probably going to be food and water weight, especially if you're not used to eating that much and if you're eating out and getting more sodium than you usually do. if you see a huge jump on the scale, don't immediately take for granted that all of that is "real" weight, and you don't need to make up for it!<3<3
